name: Sunny Meadows
description: Repus begins his journey, filled with hope and determination.

name: Twilight Path
description: Repus faces growing doubts, but his resolve pushes him forward.

name: Stormy Road
description: Repus battles the storm and his own pain, but won't back down.

name: Ghostly Night
description: Repus presses on, fueled by his love for Hcaep, undeterred by fear.

name: Eye of the Chaos
description: Repus faces his inner demons, driven only by love and willpower.

name: Dark Cave
description: Repus nears his goal, the final trial ahead, his resolve unshaken.
